snippet.title: QUARTERSTAFF - DEC. 27, 2022 RELEASE
snippet.description:
The debut game of Generic Lake Monster is here! 

Quarterstaff will release on Steam at midnight on December 27th, 2022. Take an extra quarter off Quarterstaff for a limited time only - we're releasing with a whopping 25% discount!   

Quarterstaff is an abstract action strategy game playable with one hand and at your own pace. Stand up against overwhelming odds using graceful acrobatics and powerful spells in this turn-based fantasy adventure. Immerse yourself in hours of flowing gameplay or enjoy the game in tiny bursts around your busy schedule.

Visit our Steam page to wishlist! 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2134060/Quarterstaff/
